import React from 'react' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Header from '../components/Header' import { useNavigate,useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import Products from '../Products'; const ProductScreen = () => { const params=useParams() const navigate=useNavigate() const product =Products.find((p)=>p._id === Number(params.id)) return ( <>

{product.name}

 Price:${product.price} Description:{product.description} Price ${product.price} Status {ptoduct.contIn}
) } export default ProductScreen
